website_summaries.verdict: The soft flannel covering on this camp pillow make it a comfortable and affordable choice.
pros: Made with thermal fill that can be compressed
Flannel provides a little friction for keeping your pillow in place on an air mattress or slick sleeping bag
cons: This pillow is not very thick and cannot be adjusted for firmness

customer_reviews.title: Perfect camping pillow!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this pillow for my 8 year old daughter to use while camping and for summer camps. Extremely soft flannel on one side and easy cleaning back. Very comfortable and she loves it. Easy to roll up and put in the stuff bag. Will be purchasing another one for my other children!
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Kingsolver

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow, bit bulky but light and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a backpacking trip and it is great. The only downside is that it was a bit bulky, but it's lightweight and fluffs up nicely so it's worth it. I wanted to buy a second one for my boyfriend to use on our trip but the company wouldn't allow it. I ended up with a different model for him (the ALPS Mountaneering MicroFiber Camp Pillow) and it packed smaller but also didn't fluff up as much and he had to double it over to use it. We both much preferred this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Willis

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect travel pillow for me
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect travel pillow for me. I love that it is smooshy, and does not hurt my neck when I sleep on my side with my arm tucked under my head. If you are a back sleeper, this will be too thin for you. I have made a few pillow cases for it and use it all of the time. It rolls up easily so as not to take up too much space in my carry on or suitcase. I have washed in in the machine several times and it comes out perfect after each wash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these for my dog to use on her new very small loveseat (Yes, I bought the small loveseat for her...she is family after all!!). She has always loved resting her head on a soft pillow while she oversees the goings on in the neighborhood and these are perfect and will also work nicely when we go camping.
customer_reviews.author: CLB in Syracuse

customer_reviews.title: Family backpacking made comfortable
customer_reviews.text: After our first night backpacking, we decided we needed more than just our flannels to put our heads on. I found these pillows--light, non-inflatable (I sew, so if they ever pop a hole, no worries, they'll still be useful). They were fantastic! We family backpack, so gear is spread out among family members. For our needs, this was great--soft fuzzy flannel on one side, cool polyester (?) on the other. I switched mine from the cool side to the warm side as the temp dropped at night. We will always be using these for backpacking and car camping. I recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: DMT

customer_reviews.title: Packs small but supportive
customer_reviews.text: Pillow comes small and compact and inside the stuff sack. I as well as the wife were thinking there was no way this would be worth it but for what we paid we wanted to try it out. Now it has came and i will be ordering several more. Both of us would like to have a couple of them for when we go car camping. She used it in the car the other day and was very impressed with how well it worked. Havent used it for a camping pillow yet but we think it will be fine and plan to buy 2 for both of us.
customer_reviews.author: jwoody

customer_reviews.title: Amazing pillow in a small package
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for hammock camping and backpacking. It works amazingly, great support, comfortable and big enough. The ONLY down side is the weight. For backpacking, it does weigh more than a lot of other options. It is on the heavy side when ounces count. All in all, the weight is worth the added benefit of this little pillow!! I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: EMT Stanfill

customer_reviews.title: Compact and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 of these travel/camp pillows for a recent camping trip with my family. These little pillows did the job without taking a bunch of room, just take them out of the bag and they are ready to go! Sleeping on them was great for the kids. I haven't washed them yet so I don't know how they will hold up after a good washing but I will update this post once I do.
customer_reviews.author: cece203

customer_reviews.title: It's technically a pillow
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to go with my inflatable mattress after a move. I'd had a similar sized and packable travel pillow in the past and hoped this would be just like it. It is technically a pillow, but I didn't find it comfortable and ended up going to a store and buying a cheap full size after a single night of sleeping on it. Overall I was disappointed and would only recommend this for car napping or other situations where you don't need a full night's sleep.
customer_reviews.author: This Is a Pun

customer_reviews.title: Small and lightweight pillow is great for 'trying' to sleep in a hammock!
customer_reviews.text: The pillow is small and lightweight which makes it easy to pack. It is not 'inflatable' thank goodness and as pretty good fill. It is good for a back sleeper and for a hammock or camping pad but would probably be a bit small for an air mattress, side sleeper that needs more thickness, etc..
customer_reviews.author: JMC311

customer_reviews.title: pretty small, must be folded to be useful
customer_reviews.text: Prince was great but even after fluffing the pillow, I had to fold it in half to get any kind of neck support, so after the fold, you have about a 9x9" square to sleep on, which is pretty small. But its compact and therefore good for motorcycle camping. If you have a car or truck, get something bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan A. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Didn't take up much space
customer_reviews.text: I ended up purchasing a replacement pillow for backpacking because it was easier than trying to find mine. When backpacking it is all about weight and space when packing. This didn't take up too much useful space in my pack. Made sleeping on the hard canyon ground much more bearable.
customer_reviews.author: 67 mustang

customer_reviews.title: Cheap junk.
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy...who the hell wants to sleep comfortably with a 5 inch tag scratching into their face and neck? Took the plastic tag off and this is what happened, the whole side of the pillow split open. Now unusable. Unacceptable. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Normans

customer_reviews.title: Not Super Fluffy, But Does the Job!
customer_reviews.text: While not robust and fluffy like your typical bed pillow, this is perfect for me because too dense a pillow strains my neck. I do have to fold it in half to lay on my side, but that's no problem. It also wedges neatly in the hood of a mummy sack. I would not recommend it for hiking, it's a bit bulky. Though you could cram it in a compression sack.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Annoyed.
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. This pillow is exactly what I expected. It's small and fits into a smaller stuff sack. I would have been happy with it, but I am giving only 2 stars because right out of the bag, the seam was tearing apart. On one end, there was about 3 inches of the seam that had completely come apart, so that the batting on the inside was exposed. This is not difficult to fix, (less hassle than returning) but I'm annoyed at the need to have to fix it right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Nice pillow for naps, not very small.
customer_reviews.text: Got this pillow for taking naps on my lunch at work. I have another pillow for backpacking, this one is too large to bring backpacking. I would also say its too small for car camping, just bring a regular pillow from home for car camping, might as well stay comfortable if you are camping out of your car.
customer_reviews.author: Dirtywholefitness

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel and backpacking
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Lightweight and rolls tight (plus it doesn't look half bad) Cons: The bag it goes in is a bit bigger than it needs to be, the pillow can be rolled tighter. Also, the pillow itself is a bit smaller than I would have preferred, but for travel or backpacking, it does everything it needs to
customer_reviews.author: David Ortegon

customer_reviews.title: Hole in pillow
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this a while back and just pulled it out for a camping trip and found a hole in the pillow. I’m outside the return window so it’s mine now. It’s a nice size pillow and compacts nicely to fit in a pack, just wish it cane hole free
customer_reviews.author: Dave Werkema

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars for a camping pillow
customer_reviews.text: Nice pillow. Light enough, nice selection of colors, still practical and great item for my next camping trip! I would say these are best for tent camping or possible backyard hammock. Pros: They come in their own storage bag. They are soft and comfortable. They are really nice looking pillows and come in some great color combinations. Cons: A little big if you are backpacking. They take up too much room.
customer_reviews.author: BadBass

customer_reviews.title: wenzel camp pillow vs therm-a-rest
customer_reviews.text: for $6.95, you can never go wrong. i actually purchase therm-a-rest compressible pillow for $29.00 but i ended up returning it.i really like wenzel camp pillow better, more fluffier and outside fabric feels much softer. i even purchased another one for my upcoming trip. i wish they come in different colors to chose from..that will be fun!
customer_reviews.author: Ma

customer_reviews.title: Great travel pillow
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I was looking for to fit in the hood of the sleeping bag. We have not used them yet. But they are exactly like the old ones I used to use. So I’m sure they will work like I want them to. I only wish that the cover would zip so that I could wash it.
customer_reviews.author: Starr Stanley

customer_reviews.title: This pillow is nice because it has one flannel side and one nylon-ish ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend after suspecting him longing after my own. He doesn't know how he ever used a pile of clothes for a camping pillow anymore,ha. This pillow is nice because it has one flannel side and one nylon-ish side so you can use it in hot weather and not feel like flannel is sticking to your face. Rolls up nicely into it's pouch but the seam tore when he ripped the (huge) tag off the end. Not a big deal though, it can be stitched.
customer_reviews.author: M. A.

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty good. A little thin and doesn't pack down ...
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty good. A little thin and doesn't pack down as much as you would hope. I found its easier to throw it in with my clothes and pack it flat then to try to put it in the supplied stuff sack. I used it in a hammock and it was perfect for that purpose but on a couch left a lot to be desired.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable at all.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a couple for my dogs. They love them. As a human I would not sleep on these pillows. The stuffing is lumpy and the pillow is flat after just a few minutes of laying on it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn T.

customer_reviews.title: Great Pillow low price
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful little pillow, just perfect for my needs I use as a neck roll it’s soft and comfortable only irritating thing was the Tags noisy stiff material very difficult to remove
customer_reviews.author: buckshot

customer_reviews.title: Not a two pack.
customer_reviews.text: Says it’s a “two” pack and we order three 2-packs so we expected six pillows. One for each member of the family. Instead we got only 3 in total. This is going back I guess.
customer_reviews.author: neil mendel

customer_reviews.title: Great on-the-go pillow.
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my car when I want to rest. I just recline the seat and relax. Perfect size for a car, or to use on a camping trip. Actually anywhere you want some cushion (park, beach, etc). It's comfortable enough for what I needed, and fluffy enough. It shrinks to a small bag that is provided. I bought a second one for my other car.
customer_reviews.author: SummerBreeze

customer_reviews.title: can't be cleaned
customer_reviews.text: It seems just the right size for my hammock. However the tag indicates that it can only be "washed" in a front load washer and without any deteregent! That's an important detail that should be mentioned in the ad.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: For the cost, this is a killer item. I wish I could buy more but seller has a limit. It comes in a great travel bag and is perfect for our camping trips. Love!
customer_reviews.author: MAK DADDY

customer_reviews.title: Excellent to take with you on travels.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent pillow for travel and camping. This is a small pillow (size is 12 inches by 20 inches) but is quite comfortable and restful. I prefer to use this pillow versus hotel pillows that have serviced literally hundreds to thousands of people. Also, this is great for camping. Unlike high tech super light folding pillows, this mimics what you probably have at home more closely and thus provides a better sleep. The top is flannel-like material and bottom is nylon and folds easily back into the provided pouch.
customer_reviews.author: Max™

customer_reviews.title: A nice pillow ideally sized and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this pillow (although, pillows are a very individualized thing, I think many will find this one good for camping).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: This is not worth the money yes it’s small and portable but it’s practically a dolls pillow with zero support I just threw them away I feel bad leaving this type of review but That is my honest opinion. I’m not a avid backpack camper But I can’t recommend these to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Quite soft and foldable but pretty small. I'm a big guy so it may ...
customer_reviews.text: Quite soft and foldable but pretty small. I'm a big guy so it may be accentuated but it's overall just a small rectangular pillow. With a neat little carrying bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Camp Pillow
customer_reviews.text: This is a great travel pillow. I was worried about me being able to get back in the bag but it goes in just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Tori Anne

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: Camping no, to small. Travel yes works great for neck support.
customer_reviews.author: PB4UGORIDIN

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and flat
customer_reviews.text: I guess I just need more support in a travel pillow. This pillow was lightweight and packable, but it quickly lost all loft and support in use.
customer_reviews.author: ceg

customer_reviews.title: Not what I had hoped for.
customer_reviews.text: This pillow was lumpy, and an awkward size, and uncomfortable. My dogs didn't even like it. I wanted to love it, but that was impossible. Had to return for a refund. To each his own, I guess.
customer_reviews.author: TeacherGalTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: a necessary luxury on the trail
customer_reviews.text: Gotta love a real, cotton pillow when laying my head down at night on the trail. It's worth packing in and packing out if you ask me. However, the stuffing inside leaves a lot to be desired. I think was I may do for my next trip, is cut it open and dump all the nylon stuffing, and then stuff my down feather jacket in there at night for use as a pillow. Maybe I'll sow a draw-string onto it as well, so the jacket stays in there at night....
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: worst camping pillow I've ever found
customer_reviews.text: This is very cheaply buit, and plush is not uniform. This product is totally unusable for anything. I returned
customer_reviews.author: ishanaba

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it's a great compact pillow to bring camping. Works great for my kiddos. A bit small for me, but I ended up buying two, and stuffing into my backpack for when I go camping, works great.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle D

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and affordable.
customer_reviews.text: Took it backpacking and was glad to have it! Very comfortable and just right in size for backpacking.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow for sleeping on at night
customer_reviews.text: Great pillow for sleeping on at night. I can't handle the big stuffed pillows. They definitely aren't meant for your neck. When I make up my queen size bed I just put this pillow between two standard pillows & it works perfectly. At night I just put the standard pillow on a chair. Also, I use standard pillow cases which are a perfect size, lengthwise of these small pillows, and than fold over and tuck end backwards. Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Lightening!!!

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Not enough support
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product, great for traveling because it is compact. We used it for camping and it was good for my husband. For me it wasn’t big enough and didnt give enough support for the neck..
customer_reviews.author: D.D.

customer_reviews.title: but it works great for what it is
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so I don't forget a pillow when camping. Fits in a duffel bag and can be packed early. It's not huge, but it works great for what it is. Fabric is soft and doesn't get hot.
customer_reviews.author: K. Prom

customer_reviews.title: Camp Pillow was gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my grandson who is a boy scout. He seemed to like it but not sure if he's used it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie E. Harry

customer_reviews.title: A great pillow (and im picky)
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is much better than a hard plastic inflatable one. I love how soft it is and the bag it comes in is nice too. If I had any suggestions it would be to include a smaller compression sack, or purchase one, because this pillow is capable of going much smaller to save space in your pack. Overall though it's very comfortable and I bought a second one for the girlfriend after I used mine.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and value
customer_reviews.text: Good price and works for camping. I like that they don't take up much space
customer_reviews.author: Enjoytheride187

customer_reviews.title: It's very soft and perfect for camping
customer_reviews.text: It's very soft and perfect for camping. It rolls up pretty easily back into the sack it came in. I've used it on various camping trips and sleepovers and it's still comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: silvana

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Easily packable and very rugged/comfortable for a great night's sleep. The back of the pillow is great for staying clean on dirty/wet surfaces, and the inside of the pillow is comfortable cloth. Packs tight, but unfolds into a small, yet sizable pillow for your head.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb R. Levee

customer_reviews.title: Decent Pillow
customer_reviews.text: It's cheap. It's pretty small. A little lumpy. Better than nothing though!
customer_reviews.author: Myco

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: I'd rather sleep without a pillow than this pillow, even if I was sleeping on a rock.
customer_reviews.author: Yeahbuddy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Camp Pillow
customer_reviews.text: Excellent little camp pillow that comes with a compression sack and has just enough filler to be comfortable. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick H. Mullins

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty small for sleeping
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is okay. It's pretty small for sleeping, but its great for packing purposes. If you don't mind sleeping on a very small pillow, I would recommend. But if you want a comfortable, large pillow, this would not be the pillow for you.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for camping
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this pillow. Hey spent a week using it and said it compacted very easily for transportation.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy713

customer_reviews.title: Small pillow for roughing it.
customer_reviews.text: Used on a three night camp trip. It's a little lumpy but get's your head off the ground or floor while camping. In its pouch it could be used as a mini pillow.
customer_reviews.author: BINGO

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for backpacking or camping. Small, compact, lightweight and a compression sack
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product is great because it was light weight for packing up the hill. The camp pillow packs nicely by taking up very little space in my pack. Easily repacks when its time to come down the mountain. This pillow for being light weight was still very comfortable. It was like I had my pillow from my bed. I would definitely buy this product again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Y.

customer_reviews.title: Soft
customer_reviews.text: My grandson's loves his travel pillow. Great to rest his head on for a long flight.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Brown

customer_reviews.title: Does it's job well as a camp pillow.
customer_reviews.text: It's a camp pillow so don't expect it to be super fluffy, it compacts nice in its bag and gets the job done. I have taken it on a hiking trip with a tent, but I mostly use it with my hammock and it's perfect for that! I also stash it in my car for naps or random stops on the road.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Stephany

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, small size
customer_reviews.text: Great for traveling/packing. Much smaller than a pillow I would like at home, but worth the tradeoff
customer_reviews.author: Redque

customer_reviews.title: Not as compact as I thought
customer_reviews.text: I used to have a similar pillow, but it’s fragments of memory foam inside, this pillow can’t be compressed very small.
customer_reviews.author: Dawei dong

customer_reviews.title: Flat
customer_reviews.text: So flat you might as well not have a pillow at all. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Peterson

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect size and I love having a bag for
customer_reviews.text: I work 12-16 hour shifts and sometimes use my lunch hour to get a nap on the futon. I had previously been using blankets for a pillow but I wanted something soft. This is the perfect size and I love having a bag for it
customer_reviews.author: BJD911

customer_reviews.title: great hiking pillow
customer_reviews.text: Great on my overnight hike. I like the fact it has two sides so if you get hot you can turn it over and it will wick water away.
customer_reviews.author: DosGoat

customer_reviews.title: What I like is that it shipped quickly so that I had ...
customer_reviews.text: Pillow has very little to no stuffing in the middle with your head would go.... What I like is that it shipped quickly so that I had time to get a better one. I do not recommend this product...
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: For the price it can't be beat. Initial pillow ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price it can't be beat. Initial pillow busted at seam first go around, but manufacturer replaced immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Bezos

customer_reviews.title: Great Pillow
customer_reviews.text: Keep it in my truck for an occasional nap. Just enough padding and rolls up for storage perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Fletchman

customer_reviews.title: Nice Pillows
customer_reviews.text: Great camping pillows. Just the right size and loft for a comfortable sleep. Packs reasonably small as well.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Hartley

customer_reviews.title: Could Be Worse
customer_reviews.text: Better than no pillow, but it's not supportive by any means.
customer_reviews.author: Jade W

customer_reviews.title: I thought the ones that go around the neck to be more comfortable than this pillow
customer_reviews.text: Used this travel pillow for a car trip down to Florida from Michigan. I also had the ones that go around your neck. I thought the ones that go around the neck to be more comfortable than this pillow. I even had this pillow against the window of the car and still not to comfy. Would I buy again, no.
customer_reviews.author: Toy mom

customer_reviews.title: Good size pillow
customer_reviews.text: Good size pillow. Pretty well made. Much bigger than I anticipated but not too big which makes them ideal for camping.
customer_reviews.author: LO

customer_reviews.title: too thin to be a pillow
customer_reviews.text: not enough padding to make it a pillow. The size is perfect, but it had sore neck written all over it.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Jeffers

customer_reviews.title: Not Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I took this on a recent camping/hunting trip. At 6' tall and 200 lbs, I have an average shoulder width. Unfortunately the pillow did not provide any head support, even after folding it over. I tried to use clothes under the pillow to prop my head up and that sorta helped. The size is great for hiking and it is super lightweight which all make for easy carrying, I just wish it was more useful with the intended goal: keeping my head comfortable without neck strain.
customer_reviews.author: David Ishmael

customer_reviews.title: VERY small
customer_reviews.text: So, this worked as a last minute add-on for a last minute camping trip over the 4th of July, but when other reviews say it's small they REALLY mean it: its size is very small. So buyers beware of this - had I known it was so small, I'd have just opted with bringing along a regular pillow.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisTop Contributor: Watches

customer_reviews.title: Great Scout pillow!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my daughters Girl Scout camping trips..which is exactly what we wanted. It's light weight, the bag is really simple and easy to use and it's small enough to hang or pack. Love the price! It washes well also.
customer_reviews.author: Jeep

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I have one of these, and purchased another for my daughter who loves it! Many thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Seasongs

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable but...
customer_reviews.text: Woke up with a stiff neck one morning and ordered this camping pillow. Very comfortable, solved the problem, slips easily into any bag or suitcase. One problem...a seam split within two weeks weeks of purchase. Had to sew up by hand.
customer_reviews.author: Jim McWilliams

customer_reviews.title: great semi compact pillow
customer_reviews.text: if you are looking for a backpacking pillow this probably isnt quite what you are looking for.. it packs fairly small and is great for car camping. we bought to of them and they are really quite comfortable.. they are not flat but dont have so much fill that you cant settle into them.. the two sides are nice so you can choose what works best for you.. they pack down to a little bigger than a nalgene bottle..
customer_reviews.author: Codycleve

customer_reviews.title: Great little pillow
customer_reviews.text: Perfect thickness for using in my camping hammock. Used it last night camping for the first time and my neck feels great today (it was a different story prior to getting this pillow)
customer_reviews.author: Cicelyman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for camping if you have a 4x4 or horse ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for camping if you have a 4x4 or horse to carry your stuff. If not, it is too bulky for a backpack, about half size of a compact sleeping bag. If you want to stay light and save space for other more useful things, get an small inflatable pillow
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Not Good for Backpacking. BIG
customer_reviews.text: These pillows are huge for camping and do not compress down. May be good for travel, but not backpacking.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Great! Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: These little pillows are amazing! They made a world of difference and they're much fluffier than I thought they'd be! The 4-stars is because of the stuff such they come in, it could use to be much smaller because the pillow rolls up super small with no problems! Otherwise I totally love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Good little pillow
customer_reviews.text: I used this pillow during a two week camping trip and had no complaints. There's nothing magical about the pillow. My regular full sized pillow can be compressed as much (relative to size) as this one, so it really saves space by being smaller to begin with. Still, it does what it's supposed to do, which is reason enough to buy one.
customer_reviews.author: Big Guy

customer_reviews.title: Decent but center dented from the way they ship it.
customer_reviews.text: Might be a decent pillow. Love the travel bag. But because it comes folded in half and stuffed in the travel bag, there is quite a dent in the center so it was not at all comfortable during the first use. I tried fluffing it, but didn't help. Eventually folded it to make it twice as thick and that helped a bit.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: I mean it’s little so it’s not like you’re having your own pillow from home, but for camping it was pretty cozy and it did it’s purpose. Really easy to roll back into its little bag and carry for the next trip.
customer_reviews.author: kimmy3033

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice size. Filling is similar to a normal pillow, not foam.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice products for the price
customer_reviews.text: Decent size and thick and soft enough to sleep on yet compact enough to fit in the compressed bag. Nice products for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Spyder

customer_reviews.title: Perfect travel pillow
customer_reviews.text: So easy to stow in your luggage and the perfect support for a great night's sleep. Tiny and cozy
customer_reviews.author: Stina22

customer_reviews.title: I bought this so that my son had something to use on the plane and it does that job pretty decently. For the price in a pinch th
customer_reviews.text: compresses at an okay size and fluffs up in an ok size. I bought this so that my son had something to use on the plane and it does that job pretty decently. For the price in a pinch this product would get by ok, but there are better quality products out there for a little more money
customer_reviews.author: True North

customer_reviews.title: Love this pillow
customer_reviews.text: Love this pillow, it's very comfortable. I did not give it 5 stars because it is extremely difficult to pack it back into its sack.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel but not for sleeping
customer_reviews.text: Great pillows for traveling but if you are tent camping I would not recommend these pillows.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Ann Julian

customer_reviews.title: It'll do the job
customer_reviews.text: Nice, soft, with good-looking cover. Comes with a stuff sack, but I doubt we'll ever get it back in there, as it's just too tight a fit.
customer_reviews.author: Joan B.

customer_reviews.title: A few problems but good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are too small, the seams are not well sewn and the stuff sack is probably too tight since it is most likely permanently compressing the pillow in storage. But, for the price, a good value for Tiger Scout camping trips.
customer_reviews.author: MikeInWeston

customer_reviews.title: / We probably would have been better off with an air pillow
customer_reviews.text: My husband was so non-plussed by the support of these....he stole mine. :/ We probably would have been better off with an air pillow. They do pack fairly well, though.
customer_reviews.author: Molly R

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Seem ripped when I pulled the tag off. Sewed it back shut and haven’t had any other issues since.
customer_reviews.author: David Bitecofer

customer_reviews.title: Does size matter?
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend and I took these camping last night. I thought they were a perfect size but as soon as my boyfriend laid his head down he exclaimed "oh no, oh no, oh no." I asked him what was wrong and he said "it's not big enough." I chuckled. Though he had to supplement his pillow by putting a blanket under it, I assured him that the size was perfect for me.

customer_reviews.title: Came apart the first time we used it.
customer_reviews.text: The very first time we used it the stitching came off one whole side and the fluff started coming out.
customer_reviews.author: Nano Banano

customer_reviews.title: Nice Small Camping Pillow!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for what I needed. A good camping pillow andalso very nice to leave in my SUV for a quick nap when needed too!
customer_reviews.author: Ella Belle

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy. Its much more padded than I expected (which is great) and still rolls up well into the pack. I dont know why people want this to be in a tighter bag. I would never be able to get it in. Now it fits and fills the bag, any tighter and it would annoy me to get it in.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be perfect for my sons camping trip with the YMCA. Compact and small.
customer_reviews.author: donna

product_meta.title: Wenzel Camp Pillow
product_meta.description: Color:BlueThe Wenzel Travel Pillow is a perfect companion on any camping or travel trip. Filled with 8 ounces of Omega II insulation, the Travel Pillow gives you lots of loft when in use but still compresses small when you need to store it. Stuff sack is included.
